name: Lego In Space (Browser)
description: Collect all the crystals to win! Wait, it's not that easy... You have to solve puzzles to get some crystals, and last but not least... Their are creatures trying to kill you at the same time, which makes for a fun and chaotic experience as a whole! After that however, you have 30 seconds to make it to the trophy, if you don't... bad things happen, but if you do you move on to the last level. You come face to face, with a giant boss panda with laser vision! Beat him and the whole game is completed! And don't forget, you are in space...
